scenes.description: Outro sequence and transition to the next segment.

subtitles.original: 例え何度...
subtitles.english: No matter how many times...

subtitles.original: ...迎えようとも
subtitles.english: ...I face it.

subtitles.original: 夢ならば醒めないで
subtitles.english: If it's a dream, don't wake me up.

subtitles.original: 現実なんてもう身も蓋もないから
subtitles.english: Because reality is already so cold and blunt.

subtitles.original: 時は誰も待ってくれないの
subtitles.english: Time waits for no one.

subtitles.original: 無敵の笑顔で荒らすメディア
subtitles.english: An invincible smile, trashing the media.

subtitles.original: 知りたいその秘密ミステリアス
subtitles.english: Want to know her secret, so mysterious.

subtitles.original: 抜けてるとこさえ彼女のエリア
subtitles.english: Even her clumsy side is her territory.

subtitles.original: 完璧で嘘つきな君は
subtitles.english: You, perfect and a liar...

subtitles.original: 天才的なアイドル様
subtitles.english: Are a genius-like idol.

subtitles.original:
アイドル
Lyrics, Music: Ayase
subtitles.english:
Idol
Lyrics, Music: Ayase

subtitles.original: 今日何食べた？
subtitles.english: What did you eat today?

subtitles.original: 好きな本は？
subtitles.english: What's your favorite book?

subtitles.original: 遊びに行くならどこに行くの？
subtitles.english: If you were to go out, where would you go?

subtitles.original: 何も食べてない
subtitles.english: I haven't eaten anything.

subtitles.original: それは内緒
subtitles.english: That's a secret.

subtitles.original: 何を聞かれても
subtitles.english: No matter what you ask,

subtitles.original: のらりくらり
subtitles.english: she dodges it so smoothly.

subtitles.original: 淡々と だけど燦々と
subtitles.english: Detached, yet so radiantly,

subtitles.original: 見えそうで見えない秘密は蜜の味
subtitles.english: a secret just out of reach tastes like honey.

subtitles.original: あれもないないない
subtitles.english: Not that, no, no, no.

subtitles.original: これもないないない
subtitles.english: Not this, no, no, no.

subtitles.original: 好きなタイプは？ 相手は？ さあ答えて
subtitles.english: What's your type? Who's the one? Come on, tell us.

subtitles.original: 「誰かを好きになることなんて私分からなくてさ」
subtitles.english: "I don't really know what it's like to fall in love."

subtitles.original: 嘘か本当か知り得ない
subtitles.english: Whether it's a lie or the truth, I'll never know.

subtitles.original: そんな言葉にまたひとり落ちる
subtitles.english: Another person falls for those words again.

subtitles.original: また好きにさせる
subtitles.english: Making them love you again.

subtitles.original: 誰もが目を奪われていく
subtitles.english: Everyone is captivated by you,

subtitles.original: 君は完璧で究極のアイドル
subtitles.english: the perfect and ultimate idol.

subtitles.original: 金輪際現れない
subtitles.english: Never to appear again,

subtitles.original: 一番星の生まれ変わり
subtitles.english: the reincarnation of the brightest star.

subtitles.original: その笑顔で愛してるで
subtitles.english: With that smile and those "I love yous,"

subtitles.original: 誰も彼も虜にしていく
subtitles.english: you captivate everyone and anyone.

subtitles.original: その瞳が その言葉が
subtitles.english: Those eyes, those words...

subtitles.original: 嘘でもそれは完全なアイ
subtitles.english: even if they're lies, it's a complete love.

subtitles.original: はいはいあの子は特別です
subtitles.english: Yes, yes, that girl is special.

subtitles.original: 我々は鼻からおまけです
subtitles.english: We're just extras from the start.

subtitles.original: お星様の引き立て役Bです
subtitles.english: Sidekick B to make the star shine brighter.

subtitles.original: 全てがあの子のお陰なわけない
subtitles.english: There's no way everything is thanks to her.

subtitles.original: 洒落臭い
subtitles.english: How annoying.

subtitles.original: 妬み嫉妬なんてない わけがない
subtitles.english: Envy and jealousy? Of course I feel them.

subtitles.original: これはネタじゃない
subtitles.english: This isn't a joke,

subtitles.original: からこそ許せない
subtitles.english: and that's why I can't forgive it.

subtitles.original: 完璧じゃない君じゃ許せない
subtitles.english: I can't forgive you for not being perfect.

subtitles.original: 自分を許せない
subtitles.english: I can't forgive myself.

subtitles.original: 誰よりも強い君以外認めない
subtitles.english: I won't accept anyone but you, the strongest.

subtitles.original: 誰もが信じ崇めてる
subtitles.english: Everyone believes and worships her,

subtitles.original: まさに最強で無敵のアイドル
subtitles.english: the truly strongest and invincible idol.

subtitles.original: 弱点なんて見当たらない
subtitles.english: Not a single weakness to be found,

subtitles.original: 一番星を宿している
subtitles.english: harboring the brightest star within.

subtitles.original: 弱いとこなんて見せちゃダメダメ
subtitles.english: You must never, ever show your weak side.

subtitles.original: 知りたくないとこは見せずに
subtitles.english: Without showing the parts they don't want to see,

subtitles.original: 唯一無二じゃなくちゃイヤイヤ
subtitles.english: you must be one of a kind, no, no!

subtitles.original: それこそ本物のアイ
subtitles.english: That is what true love is.

subtitles.original: 得意の笑顔で沸かすメディア
subtitles.english: Firing up the media with her signature smile,

subtitles.original: 隠しきるこの秘密だけは
subtitles.english: this secret is the only thing she'll keep hidden.

subtitles.original: 愛してるって嘘で積むキャリア
subtitles.english: Building a career on the lie of "I love you,"

subtitles.original: これこそ私なりの愛だ
subtitles.english: this is my own way of showing love.

subtitles.original: 流れる汗も綺麗なアクア
subtitles.english: The flowing sweat is a beautiful aqua,

subtitles.original: ルビーを隠したこの瞼
subtitles.english: the eyelids that hide the rubies.

subtitles.original: 歌い踊り舞う私はマリア
subtitles.english: Singing and dancing, I am Maria.

subtitles.original: そう嘘はとびきりの愛だ
subtitles.english: Yes, lies are the ultimate form of love.

subtitles.original: 誰かに愛されたことも
subtitles.english: Having never been loved by anyone,

subtitles.original: 誰かのこと愛したことも
subtitles.english: and having never loved anyone else...

subtitles.original: ないそんな私の嘘が
subtitles.english: I hope that my lie...

subtitles.original: いつか本当になること信じてる
subtitles.english: ...will one day become the truth.

subtitles.original: いつかきっと全部手に入れる
subtitles.english: One day, I'll surely have it all.

subtitles.original: 私はそう欲張りなアイドル
subtitles.english: I am a greedy idol after all.

subtitles.original: 等身大でみんなのこと
subtitles.english: Because I want to love everyone...

subtitles.original: ちゃんと愛したいから
subtitles.english: ...just as I am,

subtitles.original: 今日も嘘をつくの
subtitles.english: I tell lies again today.

subtitles.original: この言葉がいつか本当になる日を願って
subtitles.english: Hoping for the day these words come true.

subtitles.original: それでもまだ君と君にだけは言えずにいたけれど
subtitles.english: Even so, I still haven't been able to tell you and only you, but...

subtitles.original: やっと言えた
subtitles.english: I finally said it.

subtitles.original: これは絶対嘘じゃない
subtitles.english: This is definitely not a lie.

subtitles.original: 愛してる
subtitles.english: I love you.
